metadata.title: CVE-2016-6884 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TLS cipher suites with CBC mode in TLS 1.1 and 1.2 in MatrixSSL before3.8.3 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-boundsread) via a crafted message.

criterions.comment: matrixssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
